description: This file defines routing endpoints for reports-related functionalities in an Express.js application, importing controller functions and setting up routes for spending by category, income vs expense, and alerts.

methods.name: spendingByCategory
methods.description: Handles generating report on spending categorized data.

methods.name: incomeVsExpense
methods.description: Handles generating income versus expense report.

methods.name: listAlerts
methods.description: Handles listing of alerts related to expenses or income thresholds.
